Detailed Description

Interface a client of libaco needs to implement.

Interface to the problem-specific logic a client must supply.

Member Function Documentation

Returns the maximum number of nodes in a tour.

virtual unsigned int OptimizationProblem::number_of_vertices (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns the number of vertices in the construction graph.

Returns:
the number of vertices in the construction graph.

virtual std::map<unsigned int,double> OptimizationProblem::get_feasible_start_vertices (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a map with the ids of all feasible start vertices as keys and some heuristic value.

Returns:
a map that maps vertex ids to their heuristic value. the greater the value the more likely the vertex is chosen by the ant.

virtual std::map<unsigned int,double> OptimizationProblem::get_feasible_neighbours ( unsigned int  vertex  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a map with the ids of all feasible neighbour vertices of vertex as keys and some heuristic value.

Parameters:
vertex the ant's current location.
Returns:
a map that maps neighbour ids to their heuristic value. the greater the value the more likely the neighbour is chosen by the ant.

virtual double OptimizationProblem::eval_tour ( const std::vector< unsigned int > &  tour  )  [pure virtual]

Returns the 'length' of a given tour (the lower the better).

Parameters:
tour that is supposed to be evaluated.
Returns:
the 'length' of the tour.

virtual double OptimizationProblem::pheromone_update ( unsigned int  vertex,
double  tour_length 
) [pure virtual]

Returns the amount of pheromone that shall be deposited onto the edge pointing to v.

Parameters:
vertex the vertex
tour_length the length of the tour.
Returns:
amount of pheromone that shall be laid on the edge to v.

virtual bool OptimizationProblem::is_tour_complete ( const std::vector< unsigned int > &  tour  )  [pure virtual]

Determines whether the supplied tour is complete.

Parameters:
tour shall be checked for completeness.
Returns:
